Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the body of a buff-coloured pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T25 Wall 56
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393610) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393610)
